website_summaries.verdict: The Blu Life One X2 is another solid entry in a crowded field of high-quality unlocked Android phones.
pros: Solid battery life with fast charging
Dual SIM slots and expandable storage

customer_reviews.title: Should you have an issue and make waranty claim you must send in your phone and do without
customer_reviews.text: My BLU Life One X2 seemed like a great idea at the time but when it started acting up after going through several service department call doing everyting they asked including Factory rest the issue persisted I put together all the information they wanted to make warranty claim but they wanted me to ship the phone to the which would leave me with no way to call out (my issue was missed incoming calls) I even switched carriers thinking the service was the issue. Bottom line I highly do not recommend buying this phone or any phone for that matter that you can not just take back to where you bought it for replacement if it acts up!
customer_reviews.author: Baron

customer_reviews.title: System update turned my phone into a brick.
customer_reviews.text: The phone had a system update today which caused it to reboot. When it restarts your phone it needs a pattern pin. For some reason it won't accept my pattern no matter how many times I try to put it in. I'm pissed and I have no idea what to do with my phone now or how to fix it.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Great phone.... Had for a week and on Par with my HTC 10 and my wife's s7....oh.... For a screen shot.... Swipe down on the screen with 3 fingers... Pics are very nice and selfies are phenomenal.... It's set up like the iPhone ....no app drawer but a new launcher will fix that
customer_reviews.author: james langreder

customer_reviews.title: Do not update!
customer_reviews.text: The phone was fine until my husband accepted the software update on Thursday. Then it became an expensive paperweight. I am upset that the update does not appear to have been tested. And that BLU did not make any attempt to warn users about the update, after it was clear there was a problem. We could have avoided this, had we only been warned! This is also a missed opportunity from Amazon. I suspect they have the capability to message people who have purchased an item through them about exactly this kind of problem.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I really enjoyed the phone up until this point
customer_reviews.text: Well, as I'm sure you'll see the pages upon pages of similar reviews, Blu rolled out an update that totally bricked my phone. Did you do ANY testing prior to releasing this update? I don't really see how you could screw up this badly. I really enjoyed the phone up until this point, now I have to re download literally every freaking app I had and I need to re connect all my god damn accounts. THANK YOU BLU for a wonderful, frustrating evening. Will not purchase from you again.
customer_reviews.author: James C.

customer_reviews.title: Still going strong.
customer_reviews.text: Although it does not have VOLTE it has 4G and you can use software app to make 4G calls with it. Some external apps allow you to change and enable or disable many frequencies that you dont want. I had to enable use of band 5 to get higher speeds at distances away from the tower. Also using a custom rom which fixed some of the CPU throttling issues. There is a weird effect in this, if you change /System into R/W mode the phone resets so any app which does that will crash the phone. All /System updates like updating the default apps in the /System partition has to be done inside like TWRP.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Peter

customer_reviews.title: Meets my Needs/ Best BLU phone purchsed yet
customer_reviews.text: I had the original Blu Life One. I found this one to be much better. For the price, I like the feature of having a SIM card for my pictures rather than having to use phone space. I have had no issues with the phone. I'm not a heavy duty cell phone user, so this is great for my needs. I did not set up the fingerprint feature. I do like the fast charging feature. This is the third BLU phone I have purchased and have found them to be good phones. I like them being unlocked which allows me to use whatever mobile phone company I want. This is by far my favorite of the BLU phones I've purchased.
customer_reviews.author: TexasGal

customer_reviews.title: Digitizer malfunctioned less than 2 months into ownership. No ...
customer_reviews.text: Digitizer malfunctioned less than 2 months into ownership. No cracked screens, no drops. Roughly 1/8 of the screen is not functioning. At first I thought I was going crazy, then after a complete reset the problem persists. Let's see how the return process is. I'll keep you posted....
customer_reviews.author: John Nieves

customer_reviews.title: AVOID BLU PRODUCTS, SOFTWARE UPDATE BRICKED THE PHONE! NO CUSTOMER SERVICE HELP!
customer_reviews.text: BLU released a faulty software update that bricks these phones. They are not communicating with customers about it and so far are stonewalling everyone attempting to reach their customer service line. Currently, the BLU recommendation is to do a factory reset on your phone... This is horrendous customer service and communication. I highly recommend against purchasing a BLU product in the future. The CEO of BLU can be located on Linkedin with a Google search. I recommend everyone contact him about this issue.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Median Male

customer_reviews.title: Locked out after software update
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this phone for three weeks. Yesterday I was notified that an over-the-air software update was available which added security features, amongst other things. After installing the update the phone required a password to boot Android and now won’t accept any passwords. I’ve been locked out of my phone for >24 hours and BLU has only stated that they’re “overly aware of and working on the problem” with no timeline for a fix. The only remedy offered was to perform a factory reset on the phone and lose all stored data, which has reportedly bricked some user’s phones.
customer_reviews.author: charlie0824

customer_reviews.title: Great Phone
customer_reviews.text: If you like Android, you'll like this phone. It does everything the name brand "flagship" phones do for a fraction of the price. 64 gigs of memory plus 4 gigs of RAM would easily cost you several hundred if you were buying one of the popular models, and it has an SD card slot. The camera seems to be pretty decent as well. I'm not a tech geek, so they'd probably disagree with me on some points. I'm just a regular guy who needs a dependable phone and that's what I get with this along with all the usual bells and whistles.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy Case

customer_reviews.title: STAY AWAY, No QA standards, recent update they put out bricks phone with an unknown password!
customer_reviews.text: Amazon, please ban this manufacture; After multiple firmware issues with the Blu Life One X2 mini we have, now they put an update out and they left a password on it! No quality standards, check facebook page for proof
customer_reviews.author: Lawrence

customer_reviews.title: Lasted 1 Year
customer_reviews.text: The phone was great at the start-- the highlights everyone has commented on here in the reviews are accurate...but so are the negatives. I too, experienced the phone becoming a brick after the November update. After a factory reset, I was able to get it up and running again. However, now my phone will not hold a charge, the screen periodically goes black (while in the middle of writing a text or playing a game!?) and no amount of charging will increase my battery past 30%, even when I keep the phone plugged in all day at my desk. Had great potential but unfortunately, fell short.
customer_reviews.author: Georgia

customer_reviews.title: It is terrible for everyone to have to reset their phones and ...
customer_reviews.text: update: I did wait for the "fix" from the company and phone was unlocked. I had not bought it to use as a phone, but an easy way to download audible books and listen in the car without using my phone's battery. Well, my Droid Turbo 2 screen is dying, so I tried putting the sim card in both slots, and neither one recognized that a card was inserted! Guess I will change rating to two stars since the company got it unlocked and I can use it with wifi and bluetooth.
customer_reviews.author: pta50

customer_reviews.title: BLU made it right...unlocked affordable phone...another win.
customer_reviews.text: I was sceptical of this order because when the phone arrived, I was missing everything but the phone itself. BUT...after a couple of emails, BLU came through and sent the missing items. What makes this phone stand out is the amount of memory and the smooth operation. Also that it is unlocked and basically "Plug n' Play". The only downfall is the fingerprint sensor and its location. In my opinion, the sensor was much better on the back. You could unlock with one hand. This one being in the front on the bottom makes it awkward to unlock when your hands are full. Other than that, I really like this phone.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Phone!!
customer_reviews.text: This a great phone. Excellent quality for a great price. I'd buy this same phone again - 100 times. It's feature-rich for a fraction of what you'd pay for a "top brand" phone with the same features. Storage space is awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Kim Libby-Evans

customer_reviews.title: Love my new Blu
customer_reviews.text: Love this phone. My original Blu Life One just did not have enough space for apps, pictures, etc. and was sending all calls to voicemail, starting to turn itself off, and I had to reboot it every day. The one disappointment was, I thought because of having more megapixels that the camera would take better pictures than my original Blu, but it does not - especially in low light.
customer_reviews.author: Marie Hopkins

customer_reviews.title: Great Phone...Great Price
customer_reviews.text: I've had this phone for 4 months now so I feel like I thoroughly know this phone now. I love it! It is a great phone! I had a Samsung galaxy 5 and I did not want to pay big bucks for a new phone. So after researching this was my choice. This is so much faster and nicer than my old phone. Mind you, I am not a super "techie" person. But everything works great! I love the fact that it came with a screen protector and a case and even ear buds...although the earbuds are nothing to write home about.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Adamson

customer_reviews.title: Smart
customer_reviews.text: This is my first smartphone and am well pleased with it so far. The fingerprint reader is appreciated. Most online reviews of this budget phone have been positive with the biggest downside mentioned being the quality of pictures in low light. The phone is a little on the heavy side but it has a very clean look about it. The case is mostly metal which adds to its weight. It comes with a protective cover and a screen protector. Both are essential accessories. It comes with ear buds as well which also serve as an FM antenna. Considering the price, this phone is an excellent value.
customer_reviews.author: 10commandments

customer_reviews.title: Nice phone, nice and snappy (if you don't use ...
customer_reviews.text: Nice phone, nice and snappy (if you don't use the garbage launcher that ships with it by default. I use Nova Launcher). Quick charge 3 is incredible and I don't think I'll ever buy another phone that doesn't have QC3. Removed one star because it can only do 2.4Ghz wifi which is baffling and silly that a phone in 2017 cannot do 5Ghz. Otherwise a very nice phone, lots of storage, quick charge, nice looking screen, all the usual bells & whistles.
customer_reviews.author: Alex S.

customer_reviews.title: NOT A GOOD BUY!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this phone in July 2017 and since the last update Nov/Dec 2017 it has been working slow or not at all. I did a factory hard reset according to the company instructions from the internet and now it is telling me after almost getting thru all the steps to get it up " Unfortunately the Settings have stopped working". WHAT? So, I have a dead phone that cost me almost $200 that I can no longer use. NOT A GOOD BUY!!! FOLLOW UP: Moments after I posted this review my phone rebooted and was fixed. I am able to use my phone and I also received a free 1 yrs. warranty with BLU. Thank you, kind regards!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Terrible
customer_reviews.text: You don't set out an update without testing it first, with everyone having to hard reset their phones. In my case, I can't even finish the hard reset because something else keeps crashing on the phone. Good job, BLU!
customer_reviews.author: Anthony G.

customer_reviews.title: Not perfect but not bad!
customer_reviews.text: Update!! Battery life is not goo So far I might be returning this phone, the bad is the speaker phone during calls is very low, can barely hear, not good, next its not connecting to my Bluetooth car stereo every time, my old Samsung s3 worked perfectly on it. The battery life is not looking good, drains without even using it, when you look at what's draining the battery it show Bluetooth is really eating it up, and thats without being connected to anything. Other than these issues I like it.
customer_reviews.author: No Deal

customer_reviews.title: Great!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this phone.I like that it has 64GB RAM. I can put all my music, videos and Netflix easily with so much space. The only negative issue I have is the fingerprint. It's a hit and miss sometimes but it does provide a sense of security. It's not as fast as a $350.00 unlocked phone but it gets the job done. I would highly recommend it to someone who wants a great phone, is not preoccupied with having the latest Android software and needs a good amount of internal memory. Call quality is great, WIFI is excellent.
customer_reviews.author: Tot

customer_reviews.title: The phone works fine with the service I am using
customer_reviews.text: The phone works fine with the service I am using. I like the fact that I can have several apps open at one time and the phone doesn't freeze. The phone has plenty of RAM. For an economically priced phone, it works well. I am pleased that FLAC files play natively with this phone. The battery life is decent. I'm getting 6 plus hours of use. I really like the quick charger. I'm getting about an 80 percent charge in 30 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Overall good
customer_reviews.text: The mobile is good. It comes with fast charger which I really like. The screen protector which comes with it is of low quality and is not available anywhere outside. The YouTube app and other music apps pauses frequently when played which is frustrating.
customer_reviews.author: Amzuser

customer_reviews.title: They released an OTA update that effectively bricks your phone ...
customer_reviews.text: They released an OTA update that effectively bricks your phone. No competent company would EVER let that happen. DO NOT BUY BLU phones, this is a screamingly rookie-league mistake with devastating consequences. Absolutely unacceptable. What. The. F***. BLU?? 11/28/2017 - The day BLU died to me. Thanks for teaching me to use backup solutions more.
customer_reviews.author: Ric

customer_reviews.title: Misleading Info!
customer_reviews.text: I recently purchased this phone, and when I took the back cover off the phone, it said "Micro SIM" (maybe not exactly as you are reading because I am at work writing this review,) I tried to insert MY Micro SIM card in there and it would not fit in there properly and I almost couldn't get my SIM card out....I was not about to mess up MY Micro SIM card all because of either false advertising or intentional misleading towards the customers who are spending THEIR hard earned money on these products. More detailed information AND pictures of phones/other devices and etc, would greatly be appreciated for CONSUMERS when buying products online- Just a food for thought. 🧠
customer_reviews.author: Brandon M.

customer_reviews.title: Good smartphone until latest update that bricks your phone
customer_reviews.text: Works great with Telcel, is a pretty good smartphone, the only thing that sucks is the speaker while in a call, the sound and quality are too low, other then that is a great smartphone for me, is fast, the os is stable, the music quality is good, the video play back is prety good, both cameras are great quality. Do not buy this phone, the latest update will brick your phone we are 1,000s of people all over the world with bricket phones after the latest update, and neither BLU or Amazon are helping to fix this issue
customer_reviews.author: Azazel X.

customer_reviews.title: Best bang for your buck
customer_reviews.text: Just got this phone OK so I've tested out the major specs for under 200 dollars this phone is the best period the camera is not bad it will take really good pics ,also the front camera is crisp clean excellent, the finger print sensor is actually really quick ,battery life is amazing I get a full day of usage and ram ,no matter what game I play it won't lag on top of that 64 gigs storage my only wish is that it had wireless charging and NFC then it would be perfect but for under 200 bucks you won't find a better deal .
customer_reviews.author: Dylan Lee Goodwin

customer_reviews.title: Battery wont hold after 3 months
customer_reviews.text: The battery on the phone lasts a whopping 3 months. Got this phone middle of June. Now plugged in "charging" it won't hold a charge. Day by day it drained faster, now won't charge at all. If I was still in the return/refund dates... I would definitely return for a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Catherine Smith

customer_reviews.title: Picture Quality Should Be Better
customer_reviews.text: It is an okay device. Blu phones tend to be highly durable, but always lack something. I like the fact that I can use it, but I wish the picture quality was better. The battery life is good. It lasts a decently long time. The screen quality is amazing as well as the speed for what you get. It should have been a bit cheaper in my opinion for the quality, not durability, given. I will recommend Blu products to only certain individuals that truly know how to use unlocked phones.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy Rice

customer_reviews.title: Perfect phone for my 15-year-old
customer_reviews.text: My son wanted an upgrade from the horrible, small phone we had bought him as his "first" phone. He wanted a phone that wasn't too large to fit in his pocket but with a large enough screen to see easily, and also wanted a dedicated button on the front. This phone is perfect for him and he's thrilled with it. I'm impressed with its quality and speed - definitely worth the price. And the fingerprint sensor was a happy surprise for him. If I could change one thing it would be for the phone to be a bit lighter. It's a little heavier than other phones the same size.
customer_reviews.author: LadyR

customer_reviews.title: garbage!
customer_reviews.text: bought this phone a few months back. it was ok but nothing speciel. then this morning they just released a update today that made my pin invalid and bricked my phone. these guys are the worst ever! do not buy!!! waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: jeremy

customer_reviews.title: Security Update Crashes this Phone! Buyer Beware! Never again!!
customer_reviews.text: This phone just locked me out after an 11/28/17 security update. Total piece of crap. BLU is playing dead and their coders are idiots for permitting this to happen. Rest assured I will be rethinking my phone needs in relation to BLU AND Amazon in the future. Inexcuseable in this day and age. This will cost me many hours of recovery.
customer_reviews.author: Workboat

customer_reviews.title: I can honestly say that two out of the four I had have been amazing. One was this one
customer_reviews.text: I have had BLU phones before. I can honestly say that two out of the four I had have been amazing. One was this one...the other was the BLU Studio XL LTE that allowed me to delete pre-loaded apps. That was my favorite...until I got this one. The Life One X is snappy, as long as there arent too many background apps running. It can process and upload pretty fast as well. My only gripe is that the picture will sometimes wash and distort the screen. It happens once in a while...but its a reminder that you need to restart the phone or shut it down and let it rest.
customer_reviews.author: Hasan Pompey

customer_reviews.title: I enjoyed my phone but untill this issue is fixed i ...
customer_reviews.text: update: as of today im locked out of phone. I updated my phone and now it wont let me back into my own phone without factory ressting it which will remove all of my data. I enjoyed my phone but untill this issue is fixed i wont be buying another blu product again.
customer_reviews.author: jocelyn garcia

customer_reviews.title: Bricked by update
customer_reviews.text: The company just released an update that bricked everyone's phones. After the update it asks for your password and doesn't accept anything.
customer_reviews.author: t.c.

customer_reviews.title: The money you save is not worth the frustration and lost data
customer_reviews.text: I liked this product before yesterday. Today, I absolutely loathe the BLU brand and by extension all their products. A typically simple Android upgrade descends into a nightmare in which I'm locked out of the phone and forced to revert to factory settings, afterwards losing all my data - contacts, messages, photos. And the response from the company? Silence, nonchalance. Today, I regret not coughing up the extra $400 for an Apple iPhone or Samsung Galaxy. Today that extra $400 is looking like a real bargain
customer_reviews.author: Cassiopeia

customer_reviews.title: Great for the money
customer_reviews.text: Well made, its not broken yet. Glad i got the 64gb internal memory and the 4 gigs of ram, the one with less is probably really slow. Would be a lot better if you could use the internet while on the phone. T-Mobile is releasing this lower frequency signal that's 600 and the lowest this phone will receive I think is 850, it will still work but the lower frequency penetrates objects like metal roofs better
customer_reviews.author: moe

customer_reviews.title: Avoid BLU products.
customer_reviews.text: Update: 11/28/2017. BLU released a security update today that bricked my phone. Customer support does not have a fix and suggest that I wipe the phone back to factory reset. I do not want to loose all of my text messages and pictures. This is horrible customer service. I do not trust BLU now. Will look for a different phone. I have used this phone for a week and had no issues or problems. It charges fast & has lots of internal memory. Winner in my book!
customer_reviews.author: Chuck

customer_reviews.title: T_T
customer_reviews.text: I really love this phone, but I had it 4mo and it quit on me. If this happens to you, contact amazon not blu. Blu makes you wait 3wks for a replacement. Last one had no ads. This one does and it's annoying. Occasionally have to turn off WiFi to get internet connection on the road. Other than that, I adore it. Until it suddenly died, it worked great. Hopefully this one lasts longer.
customer_reviews.author: Staci

customer_reviews.title: BLU = Beware of Lethal Updates  -- BLU just lost a repeat customer
customer_reviews.text: After having the phone for 9mo, was already planning to replace the phone with a Samsung, due to poor user experience, poor picture quality, and poor system functioning. Also, the screen cracked after about 3mo of use (bought this one because the Gorilla Glass was supposed to be better than most). That cost $50 to to repair. And NOW, BLU sends out an update that trashed the phone..... The only way to "possibly" fix it is to do a factory reset! That's a TERRIBLE Business Model for BLU.
customer_reviews.author: Parzival Gunter

customer_reviews.title: Great for the money
customer_reviews.text: After a week with this I'm very happy overall. Would have given 5 star but I think the reception is a bit lower compared to my other phones. Very pleased with the speed. I'm just a standard user of texts and the typical socal media apps. I bought a second one after having one for a week. The speed and storage sealed the deal. Also pleased with the case it came with. The camera works good too. Fast battery charge.
customer_reviews.author: D. Ginney

customer_reviews.title: As Advertised... nothing more
customer_reviews.text: Bought this phone for international travel. I think for the money it is awesome. You get what you pay for in most cases... in this case you get more. Camera is good enough for me... love the duel SIM card set up. Tons of storage. My only knock is that even when I shut it down (not turn it off)... if I'm sweaty and put it in my pocket it try's to turn itself on... argh... pisses me off. Other than that, it's great
customer_reviews.author: Sue

customer_reviews.title: Take that, Blu!
customer_reviews.text: I hated my Blu Life One X so much that I decided to show Blu and bought the X2. The main issue I have with Blu is their interpretation of the Android OS. If you wonder about a function and find a "how to" for any other Android, chances are your X One or X2 won't have it. Also, I liked the proximity sensor/case lid function which the X2 lacks. But you won't find a phone this powerful, with this great a screen at this price. Both phones are reliable and dual sim.
customer_reviews.author: BartMan

customer_reviews.title: Great phone!
customer_reviews.text: There is never anything to dislike about this phone.Blu always provides me with a good quality phone and I enjoy upgrading myself every year to buy the newest phone with the newest features.They make it affordable so I don't have to sacrifice style,and functionality.This phone is beautifully made.I enjoy the fingerprint function and the camera quality is clear and focused.More internal storage and comes with case,screen protector,earbuds,and charger.
customer_reviews.author: Corrisa J. Pool

customer_reviews.title: Zero after-warranty support
customer_reviews.text: I lightly used this phone, which worked for 1 year. It is in mint condition, except it won't charge. It takes forever...hours...to fiddle with and get a charge. So I went to a cellphone repair store, who said BLU does not offer repair parts. I called BLU for information on how to repair a phone just past the warranty.....zippo. $200 for a phone that worked 1 year....not a good return. They offer no service to repair a perfectly good phone. They did offer $20 off a new purchase! Ha....right. Buy a Samsung or an iPhone. At least they support their post-warranty repairs.
customer_reviews.author: Nunyo Biznuss

customer_reviews.title: Ok I guess
customer_reviews.text: This phone is fantastic except for 1 thing. It lags. It slowed down quite a bit after a few months. As with all blu phones. The processor and CPU sucks tbh. For the price it's ok. Just buy a used samsung galaxy. Same price and faster. Pictures were great.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Nickens

customer_reviews.title: phone/service time will tell
customer_reviews.text: duel sim is great! micro SD slot is great! the ability to transfer data, not so great. speaker/volume not so great. Using with consumer cellular/ATT sim [after deciding to leave T-Mobile] calls seam better connected--again, time will tell.
customer_reviews.author: The W

customer_reviews.title: great phone! great price
customer_reviews.text: great phone! great price! this is the 4th Blu phone i have bought for my family! super fast, great design. fast shipping! and at only $135, if you get bored with it next year, get a new one! (unlike iphones, which you will still be paying off!)
customer_reviews.author: directordavid

customer_reviews.title: Good phone, terrible company
customer_reviews.text: I really liked my phone until the latest update. It completely locked me out of my phone and Blu has been infuriating with handling the situation. Says a lot about a company when they roll out an update without testing it then give no answer or response to their customers. Never again.
customer_reviews.author: Piddle

customer_reviews.title: just remember, THIS IS A BUDGET PHONE!!! YOU GET WHAT YOU PAY FOR!!!
customer_reviews.text: well, it was good for a while. charging port is all shot now & charging it is a pain, the charger itself is dead, I've had to factory reset it twice & customer service is no help at all. I've tried to talk to a few people about a replacement but that goes nowhere fast. just remember, THIS IS A BUDGET PHONE!!! YOU GET WHAT YOU PAY FOR!!!
customer_reviews.author: jim valliere

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price
customer_reviews.text: The phone is good for the price but don't dream with a better phone. Battery is a bit small, if you want to use it all day long without connecting it, forget about it. The best thing is the price and speed. The worst thing, is the camera. It's really horrible. Pictures at night or with not so good lights are impossible.
customer_reviews.author: Fernando Aramburu

customer_reviews.title: Pre-installed adware
customer_reviews.text: The BLU phone comes with system app "Android Communication Sync" (may also be named "Android Tools"). This app pushes ads, instant apps, and pornography to phone in the form of notifications. The notifications cannot be dismissed nor can the app be disabled or uninstalled. The best you can do is a force stop whenever the ads pop-up. I would not recommend this phone nor any other BLU product due to the disrespect they show their customers with pre-installed adware on their devices.
customer_reviews.author: Anney Mous

customer_reviews.title: Was a great phone at the time
customer_reviews.text: Great phone at the time for $179. Lasted 2.5 years until I dropped and cracked it last week. Moved to a redmi note 7 which is leaps and bounds much better at $185.
customer_reviews.author: ViDD

customer_reviews.title: Love this phone.
customer_reviews.text: This is truly a great phone. I compare it to cellphones costing 3 times as much... It does it all flawlessly. The screen is big, bright and easy to read. The camera takes great pictures. The sound is crisp and clear.
customer_reviews.author: Pete S

customer_reviews.title: Very impressed so far.
customer_reviews.text: Way better then my last phone (Moto g first gen). Only complaint is the weight. It's very snappy. Just a note, three of the installed apps came up on avg as risky virus like apps. I was able to disable two of them. The third is the fingerprint scanner. Don't know why
customer_reviews.author: DAG

customer_reviews.title: Life One X2 by Blu Great Phone!
customer_reviews.text: Great Phone! This phone can go head to toes with any brand out there. The Lightning Charger that comes with the phone charges the phone to 100% in less than an hour. The charge takes me from 5:50am well into the evening really most times till the 10pm hour. I'm a heavy data user, tons of messages all the time. Very happy with the performance. Easy to use and good at multi-tasking. Great job Blu! My previous, most recent phones were also from Blu. Life Pure Phones, but there was a Motorolla, a few LG's and a Samsung too.They were good, this phone is better. Life One X2 try it!
customer_reviews.author: Cindy

customer_reviews.title: Cheap phone
customer_reviews.text: The phone looks good and impressive out of the box. As a cheap phone, you get what you pay for. Sometimes it does its own things unexpectedly which is annoying. But then expensive iPhone also does the same. So I am fine with the phone and use it as a second phone when I travel abroad with a local sim card.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Stay away from BLU Products - no customer support
customer_reviews.text: After initially the phone worked fine, BLU pushed an software update on Nov28 2017. After that the phone can not be unlocked, as a PIN, nobody including BLU Products knows, is required. This applies to all BLU LIFE One X2 phones, whose update was pushed. While these things can happen, not that they should with some reasonable quality controls, the worst thing is that BLU Products is not able to properly respond and is not coming up with a solution other than factory reset. So be aware - better stay away from BLU! It seems you only get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: Rupert J Mayer

customer_reviews.title: Competes with more expensive phones
customer_reviews.text: Great Full HD screen, decent battery life, only caveat is that the OS can't be updated, it is at Android 6 Marshmallow which is out of date as on when i am writing.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Evich

customer_reviews.title: Was 4 stars until they rolled out an update today ...
customer_reviews.text: Was 4 stars until they rolled out an update today - as per the other recent comments - they totally locked everyone out of their device. Clearly 0 AQ testing done for the update. Very disappointing. After 2 BLU devices, this is my last one.
customer_reviews.author: MitchL

customer_reviews.title: Lock Screen Ads
customer_reviews.text: The phone has lock screen ads but after doing some research I found the offending app to be Z Camera. I uninstalled and ads are GONE!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Defective charging port
customer_reviews.text: In general the phone works great, no lags. But I've had issues when charging it since the beginning. I thought the cable were damaged and bought new ones, then I saw my husband using those same "defective cables" and they worked. I always wondered why, and now it has totally stopped charging and can't use anymore. Such a shame cause I actually liked the phone's performance.
customer_reviews.author: sandy g.

customer_reviews.title: Such a nice phone with Better price and delivers quickly.
customer_reviews.text: The phone looks great, feels great, works great. Everything that was advertise works perfectly, the fast charger is so quick (charged my phone from 40% to 100 in less than 30mins, no lies). The transition between apps is seemless and the fingerprint sensor works perfectly, quick response and all my brothers tried to unlock it with Thiers, didn't work. My bro even went as far as using tape to get my finger print but still didn't work lol. Overall great for a great price. Just got mine, so I'll update as time passes.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Blu pushed an update effectively bricking my phone!!
customer_reviews.text: The hardware on this phone is good, but that's meaningless when Blu recklessly pushes an update bricking the phone by reseting passwords and locking users out of their phone. With the only fix to this being a factory reset, resulting in the loss of all my stored data, and the lack of communication, warnings, or even halting updates to non-effected phones is simply unacceptable to me. Prior to the update, I would have still rated this at three stars due to the plethora of admittadly minor bugs, but given recent events in rating this at one star. I will not be purchasing or recommending another Blu product. Period.
customer_reviews.author: Matt P.

customer_reviews.title: My favorite phone
customer_reviews.text: I still have it. I have it in a drawer waiting for my Sprint contract to expire so I can go back to Walmart's Family Mobile plan and use this phone again. It is far superior to my LG G7 ThinQ I got on my Sprint plan. Sprint and LG are going bye-bye at the end of the contract.
customer_reviews.author: Micha R.

customer_reviews.title: You'll be BLU if you do!
customer_reviews.text: This phone worked great for 7 months. Then I got a service update and now it won't accept my pin. So, I guess I have to reset it and lose all my data. Contacts, texts, pictures, apps everything. What a POS! It's probably locked my sim card also making it useless! I'll have to purchase a new one. Will I want to put it in this phone and have this happen again? Probably not? Have to buy a new phone too! DO NOT BUY THIS PHONE!
customer_reviews.author: Rick M.

customer_reviews.title: excellent sound quality
customer_reviews.text: It comes as a complete package with earphones, screen protector, shock absorbing case. Plenty of RAM, excellent sound quality. We have two BLU phones and would buy another if one of them disappeared. Don't forget the larger than average battery. Great quality...why pay more?
customer_reviews.author: Rick Lee

customer_reviews.title: Crappy phone, even crappier customer service
customer_reviews.text: Completely locked out of my phone after the system update. They continue to post videos and ads for their products on their facebook page, but don't have the decency to post an apology or give anyone an update on how to fix this HUGE issue. They are not replying to comments or messages, and have left everyone with this phone wondering what to do next... Crappy phone, even crappier customer service!
customer_reviews.author: Dawn

customer_reviews.title: Great phone
customer_reviews.text: So far I have been very happy with all of the features of this phone. The speaker is a lower than I would like even when turned up to the highest volume. I do not think that it is possible to beat the specs on this phone for under $200. The rapid charger is amazing, camera is great, graphics are great, response time is excellent - can't ask for more!
customer_reviews.author: dvash6

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Quality/Price Ratio
customer_reviews.text: I must say that the phone is incredible for the price. Time will tell if the phone lasts or not. My first concernThe back of the phone is incredibly unfriendly to open. I wanted to open the phone in order to insert my SIM card. I don't know if it was only my phone or all phones, but it took me at least an hour of trying really hard before succeeding. Other than that the phone works really great. There are a lot of functionalities that I miss from my previous LG or Samsung phones, but the quality/price ratio is fantastic!
customer_reviews.author: Zoffirath

customer_reviews.title: Failed after 3 weeks
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely loved this phone... better than my NOTE 8 that cost $900, BUT and this is a HUGE but, within 3 weeks it wouldn't charge. I tried everything to get it to charge and it simply would not take a charge thusly making the phone worthless.
customer_reviews.author: Gregory A. Karr

customer_reviews.title: This phone does not work at all. Similar problems with my previous BLU phone. Not reliable producer.
customer_reviews.text: This phone does not recognize any of my SIM cards (AT&T) in both SIM circuits. It does not work at all. I am going to return the product. Same happened to my first BLU phone where only 1 of 2 circuits worked with my SIM. I didn't return it because it was cheaper and I really needed the phone immediately. Overall, not reliable producer.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew

customer_reviews.title: Decent phone overall.
customer_reviews.text: Decent phone overall. Had to get used to the layout at first lasted quite a while until I dropped it in water
customer_reviews.author: kek

customer_reviews.title: 6 months of regular daily usage and no complaints ! Buy it!
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing. I've had it for about 6 months or so and its been great. The battery has held up well, the quick charge is fast, the display is bright and crisp. I use it pretty heavily on a daily basis and it handles everything pretty well. Definitely spring for the 4gb model, its worth it. I use at&t and have no problems with 4g lte or any connectivy issues. I had one OTA update and it went smoothly. Highly recommend this phone in your budget cap is 200ish. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Jon DamnGraham

customer_reviews.title: I like this phone although why it's not 5 stars is ...
customer_reviews.text: I like this phone although why it's not 5 stars is because when talking on speaker phone the sound is too low. In general the sound is just too low. Also wished I could take pictures that are small version for mms but instead I had to download an app to condense photo sizes.
customer_reviews.author: Tonya Rain

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I purchase this phone just under one year and I'm having a lot of problems first the screen would cut off while using the phone now I'm having a set of lines on the screen there's a faded effect when I try moving off from one app to another the image from the previous app is seen in the background .the picture quality and storage is great I'm just disappointed that I'm getting these problems. Is like I wasted my money.
customer_reviews.author: Annetta

customer_reviews.title: Unacceptable quality standards
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 of these phones for myself and a family member. Both of our phones are experiencing the same problems after just a year of use. It takes forever to charge them now, and only charges half the time. They just released an update that makes it impossible to access your phone now. No communication from their side and who knows when they will fix it. I'm not willing to do a factory reset but it seems like I will lose everything I have on it anyways. Never buying a BLU product again and will be spreading the word about this company's irresponsible practices wherever/whenever I can.
customer_reviews.author: Cat

customer_reviews.title: Overall 7/10
customer_reviews.text: Got it yesterday, the brown box it came in was horribly lacking bubble wrap, I am also afraid to update the October security patch since i have heard its problematic. Other than that I really like the display, and the overall speed, its a really good ph for the price, camera shutter speed is slow, the ph feels premium. The finger print scanner is gr8.
customer_reviews.author: AmazCust

customer_reviews.title: The most bizarre situation is happening with this company. ...
customer_reviews.text: The most bizarre situation is happening with this company. They sent a OS update and after downloading and installing, the phone locked itself. The only way to recover it is by a hard reset, with the obvious consecuences. At this time, after close to three days with every single phone unserviceable. There is no an official statment from BLU. Shame on you!!!
customer_reviews.author: miguel lopez

customer_reviews.title: Was a nice phone for the price until the update.
customer_reviews.text: Amazing phone for a reasonable price! Update as of 11/28/2017 phone did an update and I can't get into the phone now! Locked phone and not usable. DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.author: SMO

customer_reviews.title: Great phone, 5/7 Perfect Score
customer_reviews.text: This phone is so far everything I had hoped for, I am on T-Mobile and it works great. - Battery Lasts all day, I get home with ~45% battery remaining after 10 hours of use, this includes playing Pokemon go for a solid 2 hours - Camera takes great pictures, even in low light and action shots - it even came with a screen protector and a basic silicone case, although I bought the uppercase - Very pleased with the phone and would recommend for anyone - Definitely shoot for the 4gb Ram option though, i can imagine that the 2gb phone would run into problems
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product, I love my new phone!! I like the screen and the camera resolution, the sound and the earbuds are pretty awesome, I recommend you to buy it
customer_reviews.author: PFI

customer_reviews.title: Great cheap smartphone
customer_reviews.text: Great cheap smartphone. Especially at this price point, it's more than I expected. After 2 Moto Es, this phone is a welcome upgrade!
customer_reviews.author: amazon shopping since 1997

customer_reviews.title: After six weeks I have found nothing to dislike about it
customer_reviews.text: Thrilled with this phone. After six weeks I have found nothing to dislike about it! I'm updating my review - I can't say enough good things about this phone. The battery is unbelievable. Has not been charged for 2 days and is still at 48%.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah12

customer_reviews.title: This is as good as my Samsung S6
customer_reviews.text: Been using this phone for 3 months. Travelled Europe and asia, drop it many times from my pocket. Wifi has strong connections and no drop calls. This is as good as my Samsung S6, but with a dual sim for my Asian travels. I will never buy the phone from those cell providers anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Baloli

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: like everyone else, my phone was bricked because their system update makes all the updated phone unusable and has no customer support at all. SHAME on BLU for forcing everyone to wipe their phones and lose all the data just because they didn't test their software.
customer_reviews.author: JL

customer_reviews.title: URGENT ALERT : DON'T BUY BLU LIFE ONE X2 ANYMORE
customer_reviews.text: Today, like many of owners, I have updated the device (28/11/2017 security update). Guess what! My phone got locked with an unknown password! Check the report on fb, just Google it and you'll see! I liked this phone! Now they want me to loose my hard work and data! Please please please!!! Be aware before you choose this brand! (No customer service! No qualified engineers, ...)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Phone is not google certified and in rooted, so you can't download Netflix app, at all .this phone stopped wirkingbkasted Feb to 15 June, 2018
customer_reviews.author: Laurence O.

customer_reviews.title: Overall good cheap smartphone
customer_reviews.text: Overall good cheap smartphone. The fingerprint sensor is meh, about 50/50 chance of it working, and the 4g speed is by no meant as fast as my galaxy s5 active on the same network. That being said, its plenty enough if you live in an area with pretty good coverage,
customer_reviews.author: Eric offermann

customer_reviews.title: Major Go
customer_reviews.text: WOW! What an amazing phone! Bought for my mother and am considering buying for myself! Super smooth! Tons of apps open and you don't have any glitching! If Flossy Carter from Youtube were to review this phone no doubt he would call this phone a MAJOR GO for the trap phone of the year awards! A total steal!
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Rosa

customer_reviews.title: Great phone for a low price
customer_reviews.text: I have had this phone for a week, and so far it has worked beautifully. It's exactly what I wanted, which is a functional smart phone at a much reduced cost. I only have two complaints so far. On the keyboard, you have to switch to the number keyboard to enter any numbers, so that gets a little annoying. Many of the preinstalled apps can't be removed from the home screens. You can move them around, just not take them off. These are really only minor annoyances. Overall I have been very pleased with this phone so far.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie H.

customer_reviews.title: Blu Life X2 phone quality compares to iPhone/Galaxy models
customer_reviews.text: This phone in my opinion is just as good of quality as the iPhone 7/Samsung Galaxy Great build no cheap material.. amazing 16mgp camera great bright quality, fat processor 64gb memory it's amazing for the $199.00 finger print scanner, gorilla temp glass I'm now a Blu product fan.. Will never buy iPhone / Galaxy again .. this phone is half the price and can do everything they can and more.... Thanks Blu love my phone..
customer_reviews.author: Maycol G.

customer_reviews.title: It’s alright
customer_reviews.text: I mean, you get what you pay for. It’s alright for a budget phone. Camera isn’t all that great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This WAS a decent phone. I unwittingly installed the ...
customer_reviews.text: This WAS a decent phone. I unwittingly installed the wireless update that Blu rolled out and now my phone is bricked. No calls in or out. I'm reading that I have to do a factory reset. It's irresponsible of BLU to create this situation for its customers. This is my last BLU phone ever.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing value...
customer_reviews.text: Coming off a work iPhone 6s+, I was spoiled. I need a cheap phone with great value. This is it. For $179, this is a steal. Get the extra Ram. Does everything well, even games, but nothing great. Only negatives is that it's bulky and a bit heavy. Also the phone speakers are not loud enough.
customer_reviews.author: Lord Rhino

customer_reviews.title: Big bang for your buck.
customer_reviews.text: For the price I don't think there is a better phone out there. I have used it for several weeks with no issues. Great display and very snappy with great clarity on calls.
customer_reviews.author: ker

customer_reviews.title: ... few days and I must I say I really like it so far
customer_reviews.text: Had this phone for a few days and I must I say I really like it so far. Its performance is good, the camera is good. It really does have a nice feel to it in the hands almost like iPhone feeling and no matter what people say yes! it does have a metal back cover, only the top and bottom are slightly plastic but cant really tell. my only downside is the speaker and calling quality. the speaker is good at times and the calling quality can be improved a little bit but other than that the phone it self is amazing excellent job Blu.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: BLU LIFE ONE X2 - 4G LTE Unlocked Smartphone - 16GB+2GB RAM - Grey
product_meta.description: Color:Gray| Style:16GB+2GB RAMThe life one x2’s design is a combination of artistry and premium materials. Its metal battery Cover highlights its premium structure and quality. Available in Grey and Rose Gold.
feature_bullets: Unlocked Dual Sim Smartphone, Android v6.0 Marshmallow
5.2” Full HD with Curved Corning Gorilla glass 3; Metal finish and Built in Fingerprint Sensor
Quick Charge 3.0, with just 30 minutes of charging get up to 70% battery or with only 5 minutes get up to 2 hours of talk time.
16 GB Internal Memory 2GB RAM Micro SD up to 64GB, Qualcomm Snapdragon 430 1.4GHz Octa Core processor
16MP Main Camera with PDAF laser focus and 8MP front camera with LED flash

4G LTE, (2/4/7/12/17), 4G HSPA+ (850/1700/1900/2100). GSM Quad band: US compatibility Nationwide on all GSM Networks including AT&T, T-Mobile, Cricket, MetroPCS, Straight Talk, Pure Talk USA, and others

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.5 out of 5 stars2,204 ratings3.5 out of 5 stars
specifications.Included Components: Quick guide, CaselHeadset, Device, Charger, Usb cable
